modName: Mimung- The legendary sword forged by Wieland the Blacksmith
summary:
A legendary sword, forged in the early Middle Ages by Wieland the Blacksmith. Mimung is forged out of
nitrite Steel. Wieland story is told in an old german Saga, teh Wihlandsage.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u]Mimung, the Legendary Sword out of nitrite Steel
[/u][/size]
The look of this sword orients on diffrent characteristics of Sowrds, which were forged in the same time in germany (500-700 A.C.). The germanic saga tells the story of teh young blacksmith Wieland, which is forging the best blade in whole germany. The blade is diffrent, than all the others. It's out of nutrite Steel and this material is way harder and sharper, than all the other iron blade  in these times.
author: GnadalfTheHorny
